New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 76 of his 92 runs in boundaries
Rohit Sharma hit 8 sixes in the match, the most by an Indian in an innings in the T20 World Cup
Rohit Sharma hit 200 sixes in his T20 career, the most by any player
Key Match Events: Travis Head fell to Jasprit Bumrah
Glenn Maxwell was dismissed by Kuldeep Yadav
Mitchell Marsh provided two catching chances on 0 and 5 but was dropped
Pre-Game Insights: India and Australia are playing in the Super Eights of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's performance was the reason India made it to the semi-finals
Australia may need Bangladesh to beat Afghanistan to make the final four
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in St Lucia
The pitch was the same one used for the England vs South Africa game where 163 was defended
Others: The match was won by India by 24 runs
The man of the match was not mentioned in the article
